root.name: Takt of Magic
root.description: PlotThis game is set in the land of Entall. Here, peace reigned for a millennium until internal revolution was started by the assassination of the king. The enemy used its dark powers to quickly overwhelm the kingdom, hoping to make the Holy Entall Empire from it. Five years later, in a village where the empire's hold is still weak, the hero Orville and his friend Charlotte are about to celebrate Orville's 17th birthday when, the village is attacked. This is enough to make him realize his skills as a Caster, and he gets caught up in... You know, world saving.Release date: May 21, 2009 in Japan.
